comment.author: 62476519@N08
comment._content: Which party is the McClelland, Mr. or Miss?

comment.author: 54403180@N04
comment._content: Apologies for our late reply to you, blujah. I would expect that McClelland is the married name of the couple (i.e. the family name of the gentleman), however we do not have any concrete evidence in the archives to back this view up.
comment.authorname: Public Record Office of Northern Ireland

comment.author: 54403180@N04
comment._content:
We have just today had feedback through our website feedback form concerning this image. The submitter of the information states that the photo is of their grandparents, Samuel Taylor and Mary McClelland, and that they were married on 25th July 1906 in Warrenpoint Presbyterian Church. 
Thank you for providing us with this information! The description will be updated accordingly.
comment.authorname: Public Record Office of Northern Ireland
